item.description:
March on Washington, D.C. -- March 20, 2010
* Troops Home Now from Afghanistan and Iraq!
* Funds for education, housing, health care and human needs, not wars and occupations!
* End the Bombing of Afghanistan and Pakistan Now!
* End the Siege of Gaza and All U.S. Support for the Israeli Occupation of Palestine!
* Aid for the Haitian People, Not Occupation! Hands off Latin America!
* End War Crimes Including Torture!

Come to an organizing meeting to join the effort to publicize and organize transportation for the March on Washington, DC scheduled for Saturday, March 20.

1 pm at Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Ave., fifth floor
(Chinatown stop on the Orange Line T)
item.name: March 20 organizing meeting
